Если вы потеряли где-то своего батю или он бросил вашу мать
То можете зайти в эту игру, и вы сразу найдёте себе отчимов, которые очень сильно любят вашу мать. 
Я, например, нашёл уже 20 отчимов
Рекомендую, можно быстро пополнить словарный запас на нескольких языках сразу.

If we ignore the fact that most of the low rank is full of russian potato farmers, this is a good game.

The game that never dies. Been playing Counter-Strike on and off sense I was 13. Im 30 now. While other games change consistently, this game ages like fine wine. It's so refreshing to return to game where I don't have to worry about 4 abilities for each player in the game. Also there is no worrying about "matchups" like most games nowadays. A player with a huge disadvantage can still get the better of another with good aim, even though the other player has  better "equipment" from earning money from previous rounds. This game comes purely down to Individual skills, strategies, and teamwork in no particular order.
